tool_description: Retrieves and processes review data from various sources including internal databases, third-party review platforms, and APIs.

data_source.description: Source of review data: internal, google_reviews, trustpilot, amazon, or multiple

date_range_days.description: Number of days to fetch reviews from (1-365)

include_images.description: Include review images in the fetch

error_messages: Invalid product_id: Product not found in the system.
Unsupported data_source: Use one of [internal, google_reviews, trustpilot, amazon, multiple].
Invalid date_range_days: Must be between 1 and 365.
Invalid min_rating: Must be between 1 and 5.
API rate limit exceeded: Too many requests to external review sources.
usage: Provide product_id and data_source to fetch reviews. Use optional filters to customize the data retrieval scope.

average_rating.description: Average rating across all fetched reviews

review_dates.description: Array of review dates in date-time format

has_images.description: Array indicating which reviews have associated images
